articles.title: Duo euthanasia: Why a happily married couple decided to die together - BBC.com
articles.description: Jan and Els sought medical intervention to end their lives after 50 happy years of marriage.
articles.content:
By Linda Pressly, BBC News
Jan (70) and Els (71) photographed two days before they died
Jan and Els were married for almost five decades. In early June, they died together after being given lethal … [+8963 chars]
